summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2827, for the improvement of, Eli Avenue, form West 70th Street to West 75th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 33936 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
